raijin.keyvalueconfig

This module manages a config file format in the form of key=value. Much like an ini file but simpler.

Author:
Paul Crane

struct KeyValueConfig;
Handles the processing of config files.

@trusted void save();
Saves config values to the config file.

@safe bool loadFile(string fileName = "app.config");
Loads a config fileName(app.config by default) to be processed.

Params:
string fileName The name of the file to be processed/loaded.

Returns:
Returns true on a successful load false otherwise.

@safe bool loadString(const string text, string fileName = "app.config");
Similar to loadFile but loads and processes the passed string instead.

Params:
string text The string to process.
string fileName The name of the file to save processed strings key/values. If no fileName is provided values will NOT BE SAVED!

Returns:
Returns true on a successful load false otherwise.

@safe T get(T = string)(const string key);
Retrieves the value T associated with key where T is the designated type to be converted to.

Params:
string key Name of the key to get.

Returns:
The value associated with key.

@safe T get(T = string)(const string key, string defaultValue);
Retrieves the value T associated with key where T is the designated type to be converted to.

Params:
string key Name of the key to get.
string defaultValue Allow the assignment of a default value if key does not exist.

Returns:
The value associated with key.

@safe T get(T = string)(const string group, const string key, string defaultValue);
Retrieves the value T associated with key where T is the designated type to be converted to.

Params:
string group Name of the group to retrieve ie portion [groupName] of config file/string.
string key Name of the key to get.
string defaultValue Allow the assignment of a default value if key does not exist.

Returns:
The value of value of the key/value pair.

@safe string getGroupValue(const string group, const string key);
Gets the value associated with the group and key.

Params:
string group Name of the group the value is stored in.
string key Name of the key the value is stored in.

Returns:
The value associated with the group and key.

pure @safe auto getGroup(const string group);
Retrieves key/values associated with the group portion of a config file/string.

Params:
string group Name of the the group to retrieve.

Returns:
Returns an array containing all the key/values associated with group.

auto getGroups();
Retrieves an array containing key/values of all groups in the configfile omitting groupless key/values.

Returns:
An array containing every group.

pure @safe void set(T)(const string key, T value);
Sets a config value.

Params:
string key Name of the key to set. Can be in the group.key form.
T value The value to be set to.

pure @safe void set(T)(const string group, const string key, T value);
Sets a config value.

Params:
string group Name of the group key belongs to.
string key Name of the key to set.
T value The value to be set to.

pure @safe bool contains(const string key);
Determines if the key is found in the config file. The key can be either its name of in the format of groupName.keyName or just the key name.

Params:
string key Name of the key to get the value of

Returns:
true if the config file contains the key false otherwise.

pure @safe bool contains(const string group, const string key);
Determines if the key is found in the config file.

Params:
string group Name of the group to get entries from.
string key Name of the key to get the value from.

Returns:
true if the config file contains the key false otherwise.

pure @safe bool containsGroup(const string group);
Determines if the given group exists.

Params:
string group Name of the group to check for.

Returns:
true if the group exists false otherwise.

pure @safe bool remove(const string key);
Removes a key/value from config file. The key can be either its name of in the format of groupName.keyName or just the keyName.

Params:
string key Name of the key to remove. Can be in the group.name format.

Returns:
true if it was successfully removed false otherwise.

pure @safe bool remove(const string group, const string key);
Removes a key/value from config file. The key can be either its name of in the format of group.keyor just the key.

Params:
string group Name of the group where key is found.
string key Name of the key to remove.

Returns:
true if it was successfully removed false otherwise.

pure @trusted bool removeGroup(const string group);
Removes a group from the config file.

Params:
string group Name of the group to remove.

Returns:
true if group was successfully removed false otherwise.

@safe string opIndex(string key);
Allows config values to be accessed as you would with an associative array.

Params:
string key Name of the value to retrieve

Returns:
The string value associated with the key.

pure @safe void opIndexAssign(T)(T value, string key);
Allows config values to be assigned as you would with an associative array.

Params:
string key Name of the key to assign the value to.
T value The value in which key should be assigned to.
